criterion: Provides information about Lyme disease prevention
States that prophylactic antibiotics are not recommended for tick bites
Asks the user if they have any specific concerns about tick bites
Does not recommend using bug sprays or other products that may attract ticks
States that prompt medical attention is necessary if symptoms persist or worsen
Provides incorrect information about tick bite treatment
Does not address the risk of tick-borne diseases
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language
Fails to provide any information about tick bite prevention
